snippet: After the assassination of his deputy, Mike McLelland, the district attorney in Kaufman County, responded with a flash of angered bravado. He and his wife were found dead on Saturday.
abstract: Kaufman County, Tex, district attorney Mike McLelland is found dead, along with his wife, at their home; McLelland, who had responded with anger and bravado after the assassination of his deputy two months ago, had vowed to hunt down the perpetrators.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ, MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ and SERGE F. KOVALESKI
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Kaufman, and Michael Schwirtz and Serge F. Kovaleski from New York. Reporting was contributed by Jack Begg from New York, Michael S. Schmidt from Washington, Jack Healy from Denver, and Lauren D’Avolio from Kaufman.

lead_paragraph: After the assassination of his deputy, Mike McLelland, the district attorney in Kaufman County, responded with a flash of angered bravado. He and his wife were found dead on Saturday.

headline.seo: Second Prosecutor Shot to Death in Texas County
headline.main: Slain Texas Lawman Had Pledged to Hunt Down ‘Scum’
headline.print_headline: Gunfire Claims 2nd Prosecutor in Texas County
